Damage: 4D+1 '''Capsule''': It carried a pilot, a co-pilot, 14 troops, 100 metric tons of cargo, and 6 months worth of consumables. The ship had a Class 2 hyperdrive, a Class 20 backup. 850 kilometers per hour could be achieved in atmosphere. Shields were supplemented by 2 fire-linked forward laser cannons. Although the Model 2 carried fewer passengers and less weaponry than the original variety, it required two fewer crew than the Model 1, had four enclosed sleeping cabins, and boasted a miniature galley.
